name: Seawater Dash Mania HD - crazy pearl digger
name_original: Seawater Dash Mania HD - crazy pearl digger
description:
Seawater dash mania, the most happy game ever!
Join our happy adventure though the undersea kingdom. Pass level 150 to unlock dreamworld and help sea animals back to the water! Click the three-same color-together fishes and make your way through hundreds of levels in this magic puzzle adventure.
Take on this magic adventure alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
The game is completely free to play but some in-game items will require payment.
seawater dash mania features:
l Seaside environment will make you going on a vocation.
l Delicious fish will leave hungry for food.
l Helpful magical boosters to help with challenging levels.
l Complete adventures levels and unlock after areas.
l Easy to play, challenging to master.
l Hundreds of levels and more will be added.
l Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors,
Already a fan of Seawater dash mania? Let’s join the game together!
